description: Number of excursions of length n on the upper-right part of the honeycomb lattice.
comments: Excursions = walks from the origin to the origin.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
C. Banderier, Analytic combinatorics of random walks and planar maps, PhD Thesis, 2001.
author: _Cyril Banderier_, Oct 12 2000
